name: Siobhan Barrett
body:
I am a data analytics student. To help me learn both concepts and coding I have decided to pull some of my projects together on this page.

## Optimisation Algorithms #
This is a college project to look at optimising two functions using random search, hill climbing, gradient descent and simulated annealing.

[Optimisation](https://nbviewer.jupyter.org/github/barrettsi/barrettsi.github.io/blob/master/Optimisation.ipynb)

## Predicting Gender Using Movie Ratings #
In this project I used the MovieLens dataset to plot boxplots, a heatmap and develop a logistic regression model to predict gender bases on a user's average movie rating for each genre. 

[MovieLens - Predicting Gender Using Average Rating](https://nbviewer.jupyter.org/github/barrettsi/barrettsi.github.io/blob/master/MovieLens.ipynb)

## Surviving Titanic #
Using the titanic dataset from Kaggle to try a few different machine learning algorithms to predict survival.

[Titanic](https://nbviewer.jupyter.org/github/barrettsi/barrettsi.github.io/blob/master/Titanic.ipynb)

## Basic Data Exploration ##
Some basic data exploration in python.

[Basic Data Exploration](https://nbviewer.jupyter.org/github/barrettsi/barrettsi.github.io/blob/master/CA1A Wholesale Customer Data Final.ipynb">CA1A Notebook 1)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
